00047 void dump_llog_agent_req_rec(const char *prefix,
00048                              const struct llog_agent_req_rec *larr)
00049 {
00050         char    buf[12];
00051         int     sz;
00052 
00053         sz = larr->arr_hai.hai_len - sizeof(larr->arr_hai);
00054         CDEBUG(D_HSM, "%slrh=[type=%X len=%d idx=%d] fid="DFID
00055                " dfid="DFID
00056                " compound/cookie="LPX64"/"LPX64
00057                " status=%s action=%s archive#=%d flags="LPX64
00058                " create="LPU64" change="LPU64
00059                " extent="LPX64"-"LPX64" gid="LPX64" datalen=%d"
00060                " data=[%s]\n",
00061                prefix,
00062                larr->arr_hdr.lrh_type,
00063                larr->arr_hdr.lrh_len, larr->arr_hdr.lrh_index,
00064                PFID(&larr->arr_hai.hai_fid),
00065                PFID(&larr->arr_hai.hai_dfid),
00066                larr->arr_compound_id, larr->arr_hai.hai_cookie,
00067                agent_req_status2name(larr->arr_status),
00068                hsm_copytool_action2name(larr->arr_hai.hai_action),
00069                larr->arr_archive_id,
00070                larr->arr_flags,
00071                larr->arr_req_create, larr->arr_req_change,
00072                larr->arr_hai.hai_extent.offset,
00073                larr->arr_hai.hai_extent.length,
00074                larr->arr_hai.hai_gid, sz,
00075                hai_dump_data_field(&larr->arr_hai, buf, sizeof(buf)));
00076 }
00077 
00078 /*
00079  * process the actions llog
00080  * \param env [IN] environment
00081  * \param mdt [IN] MDT device
00082  * \param cb [IN] llog callback funtion
00083  * \param data [IN] llog callback  data
00084  * \retval 0 success
00085  * \retval -ve failure
00086  */
00087 int cdt_llog_process(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdt_device *mdt,
00088                      llog_cb_t cb, void *data)
00089 {
00090         struct obd_device       *obd = mdt2obd_dev(mdt);
00091         struct llog_ctxt        *lctxt = NULL;
00092         struct coordinator      *cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;
00093         int                      rc;
00094         ENTRY;
00095 
00096         lctxt = llog_get_context(obd, LLOG_AGENT_ORIG_CTXT);
00097         if (lctxt == NULL || lctxt->loc_handle == NULL)
00098                 RETURN(-ENOENT);
00099 
00100         mutex_lock(&cdt->cdt_llog_lock);
00101 
00102         rc = llog_cat_process(env, lctxt->loc_handle, cb, data, 0, 0);
00103         if (rc < 0)
00104                 CERROR("%s: failed to process HSM_ACTIONS llog (rc=%d)\n",
00105                         mdt_obd_name(mdt), rc);
00106         else
00107                 rc = 0;
00108 
00109         llog_ctxt_put(lctxt);
00110         mutex_unlock(&cdt->cdt_llog_lock);
00111         RETURN(rc);
00112 }
00113 
00124 int mdt_agent_record_add(const struct lu_env *env,
00125                          struct mdt_device *mdt,
00126                          __u64 compound_id, __u32 archive_id,
00127                          __u64 flags, struct hsm_action_item *hai)
00128 {
00129         struct obd_device               *obd = mdt2obd_dev(mdt);
00130         struct coordinator              *cdt = &mdt->mdt_coordinator;
00131         struct llog_ctxt                *lctxt = NULL;
00132         struct llog_agent_req_rec       *larr;
00133         int                              rc;
00134         int                              sz;
00135         ENTRY;
00136 
00137         sz = llog_data_len(sizeof(*larr) + hai->hai_len - sizeof(*hai));
00138         OBD_ALLOC(larr, sz);
00139         if (!larr)
00140                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00141         larr->arr_hdr.lrh_len = sz;
00142         larr->arr_hdr.lrh_type = HSM_AGENT_REC;
00143         larr->arr_status = ARS_WAITING;
00144         larr->arr_compound_id = compound_id;
00145         larr->arr_archive_id = archive_id;
00146         larr->arr_flags = flags;
00147         larr->arr_req_create = cfs_time_current_sec();
00148         larr->arr_req_change = larr->arr_req_create;
00149         memcpy(&larr->arr_hai, hai, hai->hai_len);
00150 
00151         lctxt = llog_get_context(obd, LLOG_AGENT_ORIG_CTXT);
00152         if (lctxt == NULL || lctxt->loc_handle == NULL)
00153                 GOTO(free, rc = -ENOENT);
00154 
00155         mutex_lock(&cdt->cdt_llog_lock);
00156 
00157         /* in case of cancel request, the cookie is already set to the
00158          * value of the request cookie to be cancelled
00159          * so we do not change it */
00160         if (hai->hai_action != HSMA_CANCEL) {
00161                 cdt->cdt_last_cookie++;
00162                 hai->hai_cookie = cdt->cdt_last_cookie;
00163         }
00164         larr->arr_hai.hai_cookie = hai->hai_cookie;
00165         rc = llog_cat_add(env, lctxt->loc_handle, &larr->arr_hdr, NULL);
00166         if (rc > 0)
00167                 rc = 0;
00168 
00169         mutex_unlock(&cdt->cdt_llog_lock);
00170         llog_ctxt_put(lctxt);
00171 
00172         EXIT;
00173 free:
00174         OBD_FREE(larr, sz);
00175         return rc;
00176 }
00177 
00182 struct data_update_cb {
00183         struct mdt_device       *mdt;
00184         __u64                   *cookies;
00185         int                      cookies_count;
00186         int                      cookies_done;
00187         enum agent_req_status    status;
00188         cfs_time_t               change_time;
00189 };
00190 
00200 static int mdt_agent_record_update_cb(const struct lu_env *env,
00201                                       struct llog_handle *llh,
00202                                       struct llog_rec_hdr *hdr,
00203                                       void *data)
00204 {
00205         struct llog_agent_req_rec       *larr;
00206         struct data_update_cb           *ducb;
00207         int                              rc, i;
00208         ENTRY;
00209 
00210         larr = (struct llog_agent_req_rec *)hdr;
00211         ducb = data;
00212 
00213         /* check if all done */
00214         if (ducb->cookies_count == ducb->cookies_done)
00215                 RETURN(LLOG_PROC_BREAK);
00216 
00217         /* if record is in final state, never change */
00218         /* if record is a cancel request, it cannot be canceled
00219          * this is to manage the following case:
00220          * when a request is canceled, we have 2 records with the
00221          * the same cookie : the one to cancel and the cancel request
00222          * the 1st has to be set to ARS_CANCELED and the 2nd to ARS_SUCCEED
00223          */
00224         if (agent_req_in_final_state(larr->arr_status) ||
00225             (larr->arr_hai.hai_action == HSMA_CANCEL &&
00226              ducb->status == ARS_CANCELED))
00227                 RETURN(0);
00228 
00229         rc = 0;
00230         for (i = 0 ; i < ducb->cookies_count ; i++) {
00231                 CDEBUG(D_HSM, "%s: search "LPX64", found "LPX64"\n",
00232                        mdt_obd_name(ducb->mdt), ducb->cookies[i],
00233                        larr->arr_hai.hai_cookie);
00234                 if (larr->arr_hai.hai_cookie == ducb->cookies[i]) {
00235 
00236                         larr->arr_status = ducb->status;
00237                         larr->arr_req_change = ducb->change_time;
00238                         rc = llog_write(env, llh, hdr, hdr->lrh_index);
00239                         ducb->cookies_done++;
00240                         break;
00241                 }
00242         }
00243 
00244         if (rc < 0)
00245                 CERROR("%s: mdt_agent_llog_update_rec() failed, rc = %d\n",
00246                        mdt_obd_name(ducb->mdt), rc);
00247 
00248         RETURN(rc);
00249 }
00250 
00261 int mdt_agent_record_update(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdt_device *mdt,
00262                             __u64 *cookies, int cookies_count,
00263                             enum agent_req_status status)
00264 {
00265         struct data_update_cb    ducb;
00266         int                      rc;
00267         ENTRY;
00268 
00269         ducb.mdt = mdt;
00270         ducb.cookies = cookies;
00271         ducb.cookies_count = cookies_count;
00272         ducb.cookies_done = 0;
00273         ducb.status = status;
00274         ducb.change_time = cfs_time_current_sec();
00275 
00276         rc = cdt_llog_process(env, mdt, mdt_agent_record_update_cb, &ducb);
00277         if (rc < 0)
00278                 CERROR("%s: cdt_llog_process() failed, rc=%d, cannot update "
00279                        "status to %s for %d cookies, done %d\n",
00280                        mdt_obd_name(mdt), rc,
00281                        agent_req_status2name(status),
00282                        cookies_count, ducb.cookies_done);
00283         RETURN(rc);
00284 }
00285 
00286 /*
00287  * Agent actions /proc seq_file methods
00288  * As llog processing uses a callback for each entry, we cannot do a sequential
00289  * read. To limit calls to llog_cat_process (it spawns a thread), we fill
00290  * multiple record in seq_file buffer in one show call.
00291  * op->start() sets the iterator up and returns the first element of sequence
00292  * op->stop() shuts it down.
00293  * op->show() iterate llog and print element into the buffer.
00294  * In case of error ->start() and ->next() return ERR_PTR(error)
00295  * In the end of sequence they return %NULL
00296  * op->show() returns 0 in case of success and negative number in case of error.
00297  *
00298  */
00302 #define AGENT_ACTIONS_IT_MAGIC 0x19660426
00303 struct agent_action_iterator {
00304         int                      aai_magic;      
00305         bool                     aai_eof;        
00306         struct lu_env            aai_env;        
00307         struct mdt_device       *aai_mdt;        
00308         struct llog_ctxt        *aai_ctxt;       
00309         int                      aai_cat_index;  
00310         int                      aai_index;      
00311 };
00312 
00317 static void *mdt_hsm_actions_proc_start(struct seq_file *s, loff_t *pos)
00318 {
00319         struct agent_action_iterator    *aai = s->private;
00320         ENTRY;
00321 
00322         LASSERTF(aai->aai_magic == AGENT_ACTIONS_IT_MAGIC, "%08X\n",
00323                  aai->aai_magic);
00324 
00325         aai->aai_ctxt = llog_get_context(mdt2obd_dev(aai->aai_mdt),
00326                                          LLOG_AGENT_ORIG_CTXT);
00327         if (aai->aai_ctxt == NULL || aai->aai_ctxt->loc_handle == NULL) {
00328                 CERROR("llog_get_context() failed\n");
00329                 RETURN(ERR_PTR(-ENOENT));
00330         }
00331 
00332         CDEBUG(D_HSM, "llog successfully initialized, start from "LPD64"\n",
00333                *pos);
00334         /* first call = rewind */
00335         if (*pos == 0) {
00336                 aai->aai_cat_index = 0;
00337                 aai->aai_index = 0;
00338                 aai->aai_eof = false;
00339                 *pos = 1;
00340         }
00341 
00342         if (aai->aai_eof)
00343                 RETURN(NULL);
00344 
00345         RETURN(aai);
00346 }
00347 
00348 static void *mdt_hsm_actions_proc_next(struct seq_file *s, void *v,
00349                                          loff_t *pos)
00350 {
00351         RETURN(NULL);
00352 }
00353 
00357 static int hsm_actions_show_cb(const struct lu_env *env,
00358                                  struct llog_handle *llh,
00359                                  struct llog_rec_hdr *hdr,
00360                                  void *data)
00361 {
00362         struct llog_agent_req_rec    *larr = (struct llog_agent_req_rec *)hdr;
00363         struct seq_file              *s = data;
00364         struct agent_action_iterator *aai;
00365         int                           sz;
00366         size_t                        count;
00367         char                          buf[12];
00368         ENTRY;
00369 
00370         aai = s->private;
00371         LASSERTF(aai->aai_magic == AGENT_ACTIONS_IT_MAGIC, "%08X\n",
00372                  aai->aai_magic);
00373 
00374         /* if rec already printed => skip */
00375         if (unlikely(llh->lgh_hdr->llh_cat_idx < aai->aai_cat_index))
00376                 RETURN(0);
00377 
00378         if (unlikely(llh->lgh_hdr->llh_cat_idx == aai->aai_cat_index &&
00379                      hdr->lrh_index <= aai->aai_index))
00380                 RETURN(0);
00381 
00382         count = s->count;
00383         sz = larr->arr_hai.hai_len - sizeof(larr->arr_hai);
00384         seq_printf(s, "lrh=[type=%X len=%d idx=%d/%d] fid="DFID
00385                    " dfid="DFID" compound/cookie="LPX64"/"LPX64
00386                    " action=%s archive#=%d flags="LPX64
00387                    " extent="LPX64"-"LPX64
00388                    " gid="LPX64" datalen=%d status=%s data=[%s]\n",
00389                    hdr->lrh_type, hdr->lrh_len,
00390                    llh->lgh_hdr->llh_cat_idx, hdr->lrh_index,
00391                    PFID(&larr->arr_hai.hai_fid),
00392                    PFID(&larr->arr_hai.hai_dfid),
00393                    larr->arr_compound_id, larr->arr_hai.hai_cookie,
00394                    hsm_copytool_action2name(larr->arr_hai.hai_action),
00395                    larr->arr_archive_id,
00396                    larr->arr_flags,
00397                    larr->arr_hai.hai_extent.offset,
00398                    larr->arr_hai.hai_extent.length,
00399                    larr->arr_hai.hai_gid, sz,
00400                    agent_req_status2name(larr->arr_status),
00401                    hai_dump_data_field(&larr->arr_hai, buf, sizeof(buf)));
00402 
00403         aai->aai_cat_index = llh->lgh_hdr->llh_cat_idx;
00404         aai->aai_index = hdr->lrh_index;
00405 
00406         RETURN(0);
00407 }
00408 
00414 static int mdt_hsm_actions_proc_show(struct seq_file *s, void *v)
00415 {
00416         struct agent_action_iterator    *aai = s->private;
00417         struct coordinator              *cdt = &aai->aai_mdt->mdt_coordinator;
00418         int                              rc;
00419         ENTRY;
00420 
00421         LASSERTF(aai->aai_magic == AGENT_ACTIONS_IT_MAGIC, "%08X\n",
00422                  aai->aai_magic);
00423 
00424         CDEBUG(D_HSM, "show from cat %d index %d eof=%d\n",
00425                aai->aai_cat_index, aai->aai_index, aai->aai_eof);
00426         if (aai->aai_eof)
00427                 RETURN(0);
00428 
00429         mutex_lock(&cdt->cdt_llog_lock);
00430         rc = llog_cat_process(&aai->aai_env, aai->aai_ctxt->loc_handle,
00431                               hsm_actions_show_cb, s,
00432                               aai->aai_cat_index, aai->aai_index);
00433         mutex_unlock(&cdt->cdt_llog_lock);
00434         if (rc == 0) /* all llog parsed */
00435                 aai->aai_eof = true;
00436         if (rc == LLOG_PROC_BREAK) /* buffer full */
00437                 rc = 0;
00438         RETURN(rc);
00439 }
00440 
00445 static void mdt_hsm_actions_proc_stop(struct seq_file *s, void *v)
00446 {
00447         struct agent_action_iterator *aai = s->private;
00448         ENTRY;
00449 
00450         LASSERTF(aai->aai_magic == AGENT_ACTIONS_IT_MAGIC, "%08X\n",
00451                  aai->aai_magic);
00452 
00453         if (aai->aai_ctxt)
00454                 llog_ctxt_put(aai->aai_ctxt);
00455 
00456         EXIT;
00457         return;
00458 }
00459 
00460 static const struct seq_operations mdt_hsm_actions_proc_ops = {
00461         .start  = mdt_hsm_actions_proc_start,
00462         .next   = mdt_hsm_actions_proc_next,
00463         .show   = mdt_hsm_actions_proc_show,
00464         .stop   = mdt_hsm_actions_proc_stop,
00465 };
00466 
00467 static int lprocfs_open_hsm_actions(struct inode *inode, struct file *file)
00468 {
00469         struct agent_action_iterator    *aai;
00470         struct seq_file                 *s;
00471         int                              rc;
00472         struct mdt_device               *mdt;
00473         ENTRY;
00474 
00475         rc = seq_open(file, &mdt_hsm_actions_proc_ops);
00476         if (rc)
00477                 RETURN(rc);
00478 
00479         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(aai);
00480         if (aai == NULL)
00481                 GOTO(err, rc = -ENOMEM);
00482 
00483         aai->aai_magic = AGENT_ACTIONS_IT_MAGIC;
00484         rc = lu_env_init(&aai->aai_env, LCT_LOCAL);
00485         if (rc)
00486                 GOTO(err, rc);
00487 
00488         /* mdt is saved in proc_dir_entry->data by
00489          * mdt_coordinator_procfs_init() calling lprocfs_register()
00490          */
00491         mdt = (struct mdt_device *)PDE_DATA(inode);
00492         aai->aai_mdt = mdt;
00493         s = file->private_data;
00494         s->private = aai;
00495 
00496         GOTO(out, rc = 0);
00497 
00498 err:
00499         lprocfs_seq_release(inode, file);
00500         if (aai && aai->aai_env.le_ses)
00501                 OBD_FREE_PTR(aai->aai_env.le_ses);
00502         if (aai)
00503                 OBD_FREE_PTR(aai);
00504 out:
00505         return rc;
00506 }
00507 
00512 static int lprocfs_release_hsm_actions(struct inode *inode, struct file *file)
00513 {
00514         struct seq_file                 *seq = file->private_data;
00515         struct agent_action_iterator    *aai = seq->private;
00516 
00517         if (aai) {
00518                 lu_env_fini(&aai->aai_env);
00519                 OBD_FREE_PTR(aai);
00520         }
00521 
00522         return lprocfs_seq_release(inode, file);
00523 }
00524 
00525 /* Methods to access HSM action list LLOG through /proc */
00526 const struct file_operations mdt_hsm_actions_fops = {
00527         .owner          = THIS_MODULE,
00528         .open           = lprocfs_open_hsm_actions,
00529         .read           = seq_read,
00530         .llseek         = seq_lseek,
00531         .release        = lprocfs_release_hsm_actions,
00532 };
